duties_responsibilities.duty: Deliver high-quality, patient-centered care and perform a variety of delegated basic patient care services related to common nursing functions and activities of daily living.
Assist with mobility, transfers, and daily living activities for patients.
Obtain and record initial and ongoing patient information, including vital signs, height and weight, and other patient details as outlined by policy.
Assist in implementing nursing care plans and engage in evidence-based best practices to enhance the patient experience.
Assist with ongoing training and precepting of new and current employees as directed by the supervisor.
Ensure new processes, equipment, and changes are communicated and taught to other PCTs.

education_certification.credential: Basic Cardiac Life Support (BLS) certification must be obtained within 30 days of employment start date.
